author: jleroux
msg: A patch from Ankit Jain for "User is redirected to showcart page when any error comes on checkout page." https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/OFBIZ-5206
On checkout page if any error comes it redirects user back to showcart page with an error message.
Expected : Error should be shown on the same page.

Goto OrderEntry -> Add any product to cart -> click on Quick finalize order now select shipping address & shipping method but don't select any payment option and now click on "Continue to Final Order Review" link. You will be redirected to showcart page and with a error message. "Please select a method of payment."
And expected behaviour is to show the error message on the same checkout page.

author: kahatlen
msg: DERBY-6224: Many test failures on latest JDK 8 EA build because of missing SQLPermission
Add the missing permission to the tests' policy files and wrap
AutoloadedDriver's calls to DriverManager.deregisterDriver() in a
Make the deregister=false attribute really prevent
DriverManager.deregisterDriver() from being called during system
shutdown, and make the network server shutdown logic use the attribute
to prevent the need for an extra permission in the default server
